name: GeoNode Geog McGill
description: Online geospatial data catalog platform hosted by McGill University, supporting upload, discovery, mapping, and download of datasets with metadata
data_themes: Geographical names, administrative units, transport networks, elevation, environmental monitoring facilities, hydrography, population distribution — demography, area management/restriction/regulation zones and reporting units, natural risk zones, atmosphere and meteorological geographical features, bio-geographical regions, habitats and biotopes, species distribution, energy resources
Geographical grid systems, land cover, mineral resources, orthoimagery, oceanographic geographical features, sea regions, soil, statistical units, utility and governmental services, cadastral parcels
